rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming foyer. Designed to align with Vastu principles by having the main door facing north.
Central open space adjoining the courtyard, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and designed in Chettinad style with rich textures. The windows allow ample natural light.
Compact yet functional kitchen space integrated into the living area, ensuring smooth flow from dining to cooking areas.
Space for dining, ideally placed adjacent to the living room and overlooking the courtyard.
Spacious bedroom featuring a large balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows. The balcony is oriented to receive optimum morning sunlight consistent with Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom offering sufficient space and includes a balcony for natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Main door positioned on the north side to ensure prosperity and positive energy as per Vastu.
Provides natural light and enhances the Chettinad aesthetic.
Ensures direct access to a spacious balcony, designed for relaxation and privacy.
Allows ample natural light and fresh air in the guest bedroom.
A central courtyard that serves as a communal open space, promoting natural ventilation and light in the penthouse design.
